About Me

Hi! I'm Miles, a passionate Game Designer and Developer specializing in Unity, Unreal Engine, and Game Systems Design. I enjoy crafting engaging combat systems and immersive gameplay experiences.

My goal is to create games that are fun, challenging, and memorable for players. I enjoy working on both the design and development side of games, combining creative ideas with practical technical skills.
